text:
(I wonder if everyone's enjoying the fireworks by now?
I hope they're having fun...)

Producer, are you there?
Can I come in?

Actually, Producer!
The fireworks are about to start...!

Oh, sorry... Are you busy with work?
Maybe you're busy...?

No, it's fine...
What is it? Can I join in too?

Of course!
Since Producer helped with the fireworks...

And I also...
I'd be happy to make memories with Producer too...!

I see...
Well then, I'll join in too...!
